GeneralInformation.School Vision: A Vibrant Learning Community distinguished by Wisdom, Conduct, Benevolence and Aspiration
GeneralInformation.School Mission: Nurturing Passionate Learners and Compassionate Leaders who are future-ready and anchored in values.
GeneralInformation.School Philosophy, Culture and Ethos: Our Vision to be a Vibrant Learning Community defined by four noble attributes draws its inspiration from the school motto.  Teachers strive to be respected for their professionalism, expertise and integrity (Wisdom & Conduct) in building a culture of learning.  As an education institution, we seek to embody a spirit of charity and kindness balanced against the pursuit of excellence (Benevolence & Aspiration).  Our mission is to nurture confident engaged learners able to face future challenges with composure and resilience; as well as responsible citizens who possess a moral compass and a sense of their purpose and place in society.  The school prides itself on providing a rigorous yet holistic curriculum that strengthens skills and dispositions as well as imbues values of Respect, Integrity, Care and Excellence in Manjusrians.  The school enjoys the support of the Singapore Buddhist Federation in our inclusive approach to educating all students; and success in raising academic standards.
GeneralInformation.Type of School: Government-aided Sch / Co-ed School / Single Session

School Distinctive Programmes.STEM: Building Smart Homes with a Big Heart

SpecialProgrammes.Special Student Development Programmes O: A Building Learning Power approach infused with elements of Mindfulness is adopted in the character education and academic curriculum.  Through direct teaching of key thinking competencies and application of mindfulness strategies, students are equipped with habits and skills for more effective learning; and to deal with challenges they may encounter with greater composure.  The school's signature Applied Learning Programme in Smart City and Assistive Technology is carried out with the support of IMDA and SG Enable.  This introduces students to sensor technology, electronics and coding in designing solutions to improve the lives of the elderly and disabled and to create a sustainable environment.  It is aligned to the school's values-focused orientation to empower students in contributing towards a compassionate and caring society. Another established niche of the school is its Learning through the Arts programme.  Student interest and skills in the aesthetics is developed through music, art and drama experiences in enrichment workshops; and performances at both school and public platforms. This serves to strengthen their capabilities for teamwork and confident self-expression. Those with the talent and passion can further develop themselves by joining our performing arts CCAs - all of whom have achieved SYF distinction standards.  Prestigious Mee Toh Foundation Arts Scholarships are awarded to students who are able to balance their studies with active contribution in artistic fields.
